label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Map has been reworked

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Denies no longer give the denier 25% XP

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Creep denies now give the denier 20% of the gold bounty
    • Melee Creeps: 7-8 gold
    • Ranged Creeps: 9-11 gold

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Added a new dedicated inventory slot to hold Town Portal Scrolls
    • You still must purchase Town Portal Scrolls from shops as usual

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Boots of Travel: No longer shares cooldown with Town Portal Scrolls
    • Upon teleporting, +10 seconds are now added to your Town Portal Scroll cooldown

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Stacked Neutral creeps now give the stacker 35% of the bounty instead of 25%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Non-Ancient Neutrals now provide 5% more gold bounty

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Removed Daily Bonus Hero concept

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Random once again picks from the entire hero pool, but now ignores your 25 least played heroes
    • Bonuses from randoming remain the same

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Random can now only be used for the first two hero picks on your team

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Changed the Armor formula to: (0.052 × Armor) / (0.9 + 0.048 × Armor)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Updated various armor values to closely align with the new formula:
    • Tier 1 Towers: 17 to 12
    • Tier 2 Towers: 19 to 14
    • Tier 3 Towers: 19 to 14
    • Tier 4 Towers: 29 to 21
    • Melee Barracks: 18 to 13
    • Ranged Barracks: 12 to 9
    • Ancient: 18 to 13
    • Fillers: 14 to 10
    • Shrines: 24 to 17

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Killing Sprees now give an XP bonus ranging from 200 to 1250

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked and simplified XP hero kill bounty system
    • No longer includes a team XP component

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Reworked Mana and HP regen from attributes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • They are no longer multipliers of your regeneration values

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Mana Regen: Intelligence now provides 0.05 mana regeneration

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Mana Regen: Removed the 0.9 base mana regen value
    • Now covered by Base Intelligence

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Mana Regen: Rebalanced mana regen values based on the formula change

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Health Regen: Strength now provides 0.1 Health Regeneration

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Health Regen: Base regen values reduced by 1.5
    • Now covered by Base Strength

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Health Regen: Rebalanced health regen values based on the formula change

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Town Portal Scroll: Can now be canceled and prevented by Root

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fixed inconsistencies between different Root sources:

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Stasis Trap now provides True Sight

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• The following roots no longer interrupt channeling spells or the current action:
    • Dark Troll Ensnare
    • Searing Chains
    • Naga Siren Ensnare
    • Crystal Maiden Frostbite
    • Entangling Claws
    • Nature's Guise
    • Overgrowth

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Cleave damage is now normal physical damage type, causing it to get reduced by the armor of each unit impacted

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Cleave abilities damage values have been rescaled

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Increased standard Cleave area. Distance increased from 625 to 650, final width increased from 330 to 360

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Affects: Great Cleave, Empower, Battle Fury, and Talents

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Templar Assassin: Psi Blades can now spill off of illusions

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Changed how illusion incoming damage is processed; it now happens at the final step
    • Thus it won't splash over extra damage with things like Psi Blades

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fixed Splash damage being affected by Spell Lifesteal and Spell Amplification

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fixed Splash damage not considering armor type

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Black Dragon Splash Attack damage type changed from Magical Damage to Physical Damage

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Black Dragon Splash Attack now does its full damage in the 250 AoE
    • Instead of 100% at 150, 75% at 225, and 50% at 300

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Similar adjustments to Dragon Knight's splash damage described below

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• The following abilities no longer pierce Spell Immunity:
    • Curse of Avernus
    • Acid Spray
    • Bloodrage
    • Thirst
    • Elder Dragon Form
    • Lycan WolfCripple
    • Epicenter
    • Entangling Claws
    • SpiderlingPoison Sting
    • Anchor Smash
    • Nature's Guise
    • Wave of Terror
    • VenomancerPoison Sting
    • The Swarm
    • Maledictdebuff
    • GhostFrost Attack
    • Wrath of Nature
    • Nether WardMana Degen
    • Life Draintargeting
    • Primal RoarSecondary Knockback
    • Requiem of Souls
    • March of the Machinescollision
    • Atrophy Aura
    • Tombstone
    • Flesh Golem
    • Wall of Replicaslow
    • Naga SirenEnsnare
    • Dark Troll SummonerEnsnare
    • Wild Axes
    • Natural Order
    • Death Pulseprojectile
    • Assassinate
    • Shiva's GuardAura
    • Assault CuirassAura
    • TornadoTempestAura
    • Orb of Venom

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Black King Bar: Recipe cost increased from 1375 to 1450

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Poison Sting can now be dispelled

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hex state can now be removed by strong dispels

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Towers no longer gain extra armor per nearby enemy hero

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Tower health increased to account for some of this:
    • Tier 1 Towers health increased from 1600 to 1800
    • Tier 2 Towers health increased from 1600 to 1900
    • Tier 3 Towers health increased from 1600 to 2000
    • Tier 4 Towers health increased from 1600 to 2100

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Melee Barracks health increased from 2000 to 2200

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ranged Barracks health increased from 1200 to 1300

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient health increased from 4250 to 4500

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Day/Night cycle increased from 4 minutes to 5 minutes

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Scan no longer ignores units in the Roshan pit

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Max attack speed increased from 600 to 700

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Default aura range increased from 900 to 1200
    • Gem of True Sight, Heartstopper Aura, Tower Aura, and Natural Order remain unchanged

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Removed movement speed modifiers from spawned creeps
    • Previously different lanes would have faster/slower creeps during the first 7.5 minutes of the game

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new sound that gets played when all of a team's barracks are destroyed

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Opening secondary shops now highlights the items in the full shop UI, rather than switching to a filtered view

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • AoE of other wards are now shown during ward placement

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Added a new game state, Leashed
    • Leashed units follow the same rules as rooted units with regards to teleport and mobility based abilities, but can still use normal movement
    • The following abilities now apply the Leashed state:
      • Pounce
      • Dream Coil
      • Soulbind

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Self damage no longer disables things like Clarity, Bottle, Blink, etc.

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Lifesteal amount is no longer limited by the current HP of the target and uses the full damage you are dealing instead

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Backpack can no longer be manipulated while taunted

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Reduced the following movement speed talents:
    • Abaddon(25➜20)
    • Axe(40➜30)
    • Bane(65➜50)
    • Batrider(50➜40)
    • Bounty Hunter(25➜20)
    • Dazzle(50➜40)
    • Enchantress(25➜20)
    • Legion Commander(50➜40)
    • Lich(25➜20)
    • Naga Siren(25➜20)
    • Nature's Prophet(35➜25)
    • Night Stalker(45➜40)
    • Nyx Assassin(35➜30)
    • Ogre Magi(90➜75)
    • Oracle(65➜50)
    • Outworld Devourer(35➜30)
    • Pangolier(25➜20)
    • Pugna(25➜20)
    • Sand King(25➜20)
    • Shadow Demon(35➜30)
    • Skywrath Mage(25➜20)
    • Techies(60➜50)
    • Tidehunter(25➜20)
    • Tinker(40➜30)
    • Underlord(30➜25)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Intelligence hero strength gain increased by 0.2
    • Except forBane,Outworld Devourer,Queen of Pain,Ogre Magi, andZeus

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Killing an Observer or Sentry ward now prints out a notification in chat to your allies

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Respawn time for level 1/2/3/4 increased from 5/7/9/13 to 6/8/10/14

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Reverted a global turn rate change done in 7.00
    • Max turn rate speed was increased by 15%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Attribute growth values that had 2 decimal points have been rounded up

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Shrine Sanctuary ability now additionally restores 2% HP/Mana pool per second
    • As they no longer naturally scale with the intelligence mana regen changes

label: Phase Boots
descriptionHtml:
• No longer has an active
  • Now passively gives you movement speed bonus, collision phasing, and turn rate anytime you issue an attack to a target
  • Buff dispels whenever you move elsewhere and cancel your attack
  • Maximum range of 900 for attack orders
    • (Activates when entering within 900 range)
  • This has no cooldown
  • Buff lingers for 0.5 seconds
  • Phase movement speed bonus on ranged heroes reduced from 13% to 10%
  • Reworked Phase Boots Recipe

label: Power Treads
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires a Blades of Attack instead of a Gloves of Haste
    • Grants +16 damage instead of attack speed
  • Attribute bonus increased from 10 to 12

label: Tranquil Boots
descriptionHtml: • No longer gets disabled by attacking creeps

label: Heaven's Halberd
descriptionHtml: • Now provides +14% Status Resistance instead of Maim

label: Sange and Yasha
descriptionHtml: • Now provides +16% Status Resistance instead of Maim

label: Sange
descriptionHtml:
• Now provides +12% Status Resistance instead of Maim
  • Recipe cost reduced from 700 to 650

label: Yasha
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost reduced from 700 to 650

label: Kaya
descriptionHtml: • Recipe increased from 500 to 650

label: Yasha and Kaya
descriptionHtml: • Costs 4200 gold

label: Kaya and Sange
descriptionHtml: • Costs 4200 gold

label: Ring of Tarrasque
descriptionHtml:
• Costs 700 gold
  • Grants +3.75 HP Regen and +150 Health
  • Upgrades into Heart of Tarrasque and Holy Locket

label: Holy Locket
descriptionHtml:
• Costs 2650 gold
  • Causes all heals and hp regen you provide to be amplified by 25%

label: Solar Crest
descriptionHtml: • Reworked recipe and bonuses

label: Crown
descriptionHtml:
• Costs 450 Gold (available in side shop)
  • +4 All Stats
  • Used in items that previously required Bracer, Wraith Band, and Null Talisman

label: Ring of Aquila
descriptionHtml: • Removed Ring of Aquila from the game

label: Bracer
descriptionHtml: • Now gives +6% Magic Resistance

label: Wraith Band
descriptionHtml: • Now gives +8 Attack Speed

label: Null Talisman
descriptionHtml: • Now gives +3% Spell Amp

label: Hurricane Pike
descriptionHtml: • Now has a 450 gold recipe instead of Wraith Band

label: Dagon
descriptionHtml: • Recipe changed

label: Veil of Discord
descriptionHtml: • Recipe changed

label: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml: • Recipe changed

label: Rod of Atos
descriptionHtml: • Recipe changed

label: Ring of Basilius
descriptionHtml: • Mana regeneration increased from 0.5 to 0.65

label: Bloodstone
descriptionHtml:
• No longer has Pocket Deny
  • No longer reduces respawn times
  • Now passively doubles your mana regeneration
  • Starts with 12 charges, deaths remove 3 charges, kills provide 1 charge
  • Each charge provides 0.25 MP and HP regen
  • Can now be cast, transferring 60% of your current mana to health
    • Regen is provided over 2 seconds
  • Cooldown: 250

label: Aeon Disk
descriptionHtml:
• Health increased from 250 to 300
  • Mana increased from 250 to 300
  • No longer provides passive Status Resistance
  • Provides +50% Status Resistance during the 2.5s active buff duration

label: Satanic
descriptionHtml:
• Passively provides 30% Status Resistance
  • Bonus damage reduced from 50 to 25

label: Heart of Tarrasque
descriptionHtml:
• Now provides +50% Health Regen Amplification
  • Out-of-combat regen reduced from 7% to 5%
    • Adjustment for the heal amp
  • HP bonus reduced from 500 to 400
  • Now requires Reaver, Vitality Booster, Ring of Tarrasque, and a 400 gold recipe

label: Spirit Vessel
descriptionHtml:
• No longer amplifies health regen nor provides current health percentage regen
  • Enemy damage per second increased from 20 to 25
    • Matches Urn of Shadows now
    • Still deals current health as damage and negates regen

label: Headdress
descriptionHtml: • Headdress Recipe reduced from 300 to 175

label: Mekansm
descriptionHtml:
• Recipe increased from 900 to 950
    • Overall cost reduced by 75

label: Arcane Boots
descriptionHtml: • Mana restore increased from 135 to 160

label: Guardian Greaves
descriptionHtml:
• Heal increased from 275 to 300
  • Mana restore increased from 160 to 200

label: Pipe of Insight
descriptionHtml: • Now gives the +2 Stats from its components

label: Skull Basher
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost reduced from 1000 to 900

label: Butterfly
descriptionHtml: • No longer has an active ability

label: Crystalys
descriptionHtml: • Bonus damage increased from +30 to +38

label: Desolator
descriptionHtml: • Armor reduction increased from 6 to 7

label: Force Staff
descriptionHtml: • Can now override Slark'sPounce

label: Hand of Midas
descriptionHtml: • Attack Speed increased from 30 to 40

label: Sentry Ward
descriptionHtml: • Range increased from 850 to 1000

label: Gem of True Sight
descriptionHtml:
• Grants 300 ground vision and true sight to the team that last held when it is dropped on the ground
  • Lasts until it is picked up

label: Morbid Mask
descriptionHtml:
• No longer provides +10 Damage
  • Cost reduced from 1100 to 900

label: Mask of Madness
descriptionHtml: • Damage reduced from +20 to +10

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed increased from 310 to 325
  • Base agility increased by 6
    • Base armor unchanged

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml: • Ice Vortexno longer has a self bonus

label: Anti-Mage
descriptionHtml: • Removed Scepter upgrade

label: Arc Warden
descriptionHtml: • Tempest Doublebounty increased from a fixed 180 Gold/XP to 180/240/300

label: Axe
descriptionHtml: • Berserker's Callarmor bonus reduced from 40 to 30

label: Bane
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedEnfeeble
    • Adds a debuff to the enemy unit, applying 36/44/52/60% negative status resistance to the target (which causes debuffs to last longer)
    • Reduces the enemy's attack speed by 40/60/80/100
    • Lasts 8 seconds
    • Can be dispelled
    • Cast Range: 1000
    • Cooldown: 12/10/8/6
    • Mana Cost: 70/90/110/130

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Flaming Lassonow does 20/40/60 damage per second
    • Scepter no longer provides this
    • Ticks once per second

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Call of the Wildhas been reworked
    • It no longer summons a neutral creep, and now has two separate hotkeys for the Boar and the Hawk
    • The Hawk is a global point target ability that sends a permanently invisible uncontrollable hawk to that location starting from where you are

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Thirstchanged from giving attack damage to +30/45/60/75 Attack Speed
  • Thirst movement speed increased from 7/18/29/40% to 12/24/36/48%

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml: • Strength from 18 + 2.1 to 20 + 2.5

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Intelligence gain increased from 1.3 to 1.6
  • Base movement speed increased from 295 to 305

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml: • Viscous Nasal Gooarmor reduction increased from 1/1.4/1.8/2.2 to 1.4/1.8/2.2/2.6

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml: • Spiderling/Spiderite magic resistance reduced from 50% to 40%

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml: • Strength gain reduced from 4.3 to 4

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedChaos Strike
    • Passive cooldown ability
    • Lands a critical strike for a random amount, between Min Crit: 120% and Max Crit: 160/190/220/250%
    • Has 35/40/45/50% lifesteal for this hit
    • Cooldown: 8/7/6/5

label: Chen
descriptionHtml:
• Penitenceprojectile speed reduced from 2000 to 1400
  • Penitence no longer amplifies damage
  • Penitence now causes all allied units attacking the target unit to gain 30/60/90/120 Attack Speed

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml:
• Replaced Death Pact withBurning Army
    • Uses Vector Targeting
    • Spawns 4/5/6 Fiery Skeleton Archers along a 1300 line
    • Skeletons attack using Searing Arrows, have your base damage, are immobile and take 2 hits to kill from a hero
    • They only attack enemy heroes (like WD ward, but killable)
    • Attack range matches your hero
    • Spawn at 0.8 second intervals
    • Cast Range: 800
    • Cooldown 110
    • Mana Cost: 125/175/225
    • Lasts 20 seconds
    • Base Attack Time: 1.8/1.65/1.5

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml: • Rocket Flareprojectile speed increased from 1750 to 2250

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml: • Base damage increased by 2

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Surgeduration rescaled from 3/4.5/6/7.5 to 6
  • Surge cooldown rescaled from 13/12/11/10 to 16/14/12/10
  • Surge now causes the target to be unslowable
  • Surge speed changed from 550 to +36/54/72/90%
  • Surge now causes the target to ignore movement speed limit
  • Surge now causes the target to ignore unit collisions

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml:
• Poison Touchmana cost increased from 80 to 80/90/100/110
  • Poison Touch debuff now stacks

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed increased from 305 to 310

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml: • Thunder Strikedamage increased from 40/60/80/100 to 45/70/95/120

label: Doom
descriptionHtml: • Base attack range increased from 150 to 175

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Elder Dragon FormSplash Attack now does 75% damage in the 300 AoE
    • Instead of 100% in 50 AoE, 50% in 150 AoE, 25% in 250 AoE
  • Elder Dragon Form Splash Attack no longer does partial damage if the attack misses

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml: • Precision Auranow provides attack speed based on 20/36/52/68% of your Agility, rather than damage based on 10/20/30/40% of your agility

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml: • Fissurecooldown increased from 18/17/16/15 to 21/19/17/15

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Strength gain increased from 3.5 to 3.8

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Astral Spiritdamage reduced from 60/90/120/150 to 50
  • Astral Spirit return speed increased from 600 to 800
  • Astral Spirit attack damage per hero from 15/30/45/60 to 20/40/60/80
  • Astral Spirit now provides +1.5/3/4.5/6 Armor per hero hit and +0.5 per creep
  • Astral Spirit movement speed increased from 5% to 7%
  • Astral Spirit movement speed cap increased from 30% to 40%
  • Astral Spirit bonus duration increased from 9 to 10 seconds

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Fire Remnantnow does damage along the way (at half radius) instead of only at the destination
    • Only hits enemies once per remnant

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml: • Base movement speed reduced from 300 to 290

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Time Locknow causes Faceless Void to land a free second attack while the target is locked in place
    • Deals bonus 30/40/50/60 damage and bashes for 0.75 seconds

label: Grimstroke
descriptionHtml: • Enabled Grimstroke in Captains Mode

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Berserker's Bloodno longer gives magic resistance
    • Now provides health regen up to 20/40/60/80% of Strength based on missing health
  • Berserker's Blood now ramps up faster when lower health

label: Io
descriptionHtml: • SpiritsCooldown increased from 26/22/18/14 to 26/24/22/20

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml: • Macropyredamage now lingers on the affected units for 2 seconds

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml: • Agility increased by 10 (base damage unchanged)

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml:
• Removed Mana Leak and Spirit Form
    • Recall has been moved to Chen

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml: • Winning aDuelautomatically castsPress the Attackon you

label: Lich
descriptionHtml: • Intelligence increased from 16 + 3.3 to 20 + 3.6

label: Lifestealer
descriptionHtml: • Feastchanged from 4.5/5.5/6.5/7.5% of Current Health to 1.75/2.5/3.25/4% of Max Health

label: Lion
descriptionHtml: • Mana Drainslow increased from 16/19/22/25% to 20/24/28/32%

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml: • Base movement speed increased from 320 to 340

label: Luna
descriptionHtml: • Lunar Blessingnow provides +8/14/20/26 Primary Attribute bonus as the aura bonus, rather than bonus damage

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedHowl
    • Now grants +21/34/47/60 Attack Speed, +3/4/5/6 Armor, and +4/6/8/10 HP regen to all player controlled units on the map
    • Lasts 9 seconds
    • Cooldown: 50/45/40/35
    • Mana Cost: 25/30/35/40

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml: • Skewercooldown reduced from 25 to 26/24/22/20

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml:
• Stone Gazeno longer grants enemies +100% Magic Resistance
  • Stone Gaze no longer instantly kills illusions

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml: • Base movement speed increased from 310 to 320

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml: • Leapnow causes the direction Mirana is facing to point towards the leap direction

label: Monkey King
descriptionHtml:
• Mischiefwill now always transform into a courier when nearby another courier
  • Mischief now grants you 0.3 seconds of invulnerability when transforming into another unit
  • Mischief cooldown increased from 3 to 20

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml: • Waveformcooldown increased from 14/13/12/11 to 17/15/13/11

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml:
• Mirror Imageduration reduced from 30 to 24
  • Mirror Image cooldown reduced from 40 to 45/40/35/30
  • Mirror Image mana cost rescaled from 70/80/90/100 to 70/85/100/115
  • Mirror Image incoming damage reduced from 550/500/450/400% to 475/450/425/400%

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Treants experience bounty reduced from 30 to 20
  • Treants gold bounty reduced from 21 to 16

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml: • Base attack range reduced from 550 to 500

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedCrippling Fear
    • It is now an activated 375 range aura that silences all enemies while they are nearby
    • Aura lasts 5/6/7/8 seconds (3 during day)
    • No longer has a miss chance
    • Cooldown: 30/25/20/15
    • Mana Cost: 50
    • Since this is an aura, it can't be dispelled with Manta

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Vendettanow applies a break debuff on the target for 4 seconds

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml:
• Multicastnow affects targeted offensive items
    • Will cause the item to cast again at a different random enemy unit
  • Multicast no longer provides passive improvements to the base abilities

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml: • Purificationcan now be cast on Spell Immune units

label: Oracle
descriptionHtml: • Fortune's Enddamage increased from 90/120/150/180 to 120/150/180/210

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml:
• Arcane Orbnow splashes its bonus damage in a 175 AoE around the target
  • Arcane Orb no longer does bonus damage to illusions

label: Pangolier
descriptionHtml:
• Replaced Heartpiercer withLucky Shot
    • Gains a 20% chance to apply a debuff for 2/3/4/5 seconds that slows the target by 40% and causes the target to be either Silenced or Disarmed
    • Multiple instances of this debuff stack

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Phantom Strikecooldown rescaled from 14/11/8/5 to 11/9/7/5
  • Phantom Strike cast point reduced from 0.3 to 0.25
  • Phantom Strike Attack Speed rescaled from 130 to 100/125/150/175
  • Phantom Strike no longer has an attack limit
  • Phantom Strike Attack Speed bonus now lasts for 2.5 seconds
  • Phantom Strike mana cost rescaled from 50 to 35/40/45/50
  • Phantom Strike Attack Speed bonus no longer depends on attacking the specific target

label: Phantom Lancer
descriptionHtml: • Spirit Lanceslow reduced from 10/20/30/40% to 10/18/26/34%

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml: • Icarus Diveslow rescaled from 28% to 19/22/25/28%

label: Puck
descriptionHtml: • Dream Coilnow applies a Leashed state to the targets, disallowing teleportation and mobility based abilities

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml:
• Flesh Heapno longer gives Magic Resistance
  • Flesh Heap now grants 3/6/9/12 HP regen

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml:
• Sonic Wavenow knocks units back 350 units over 1.4 seconds
    • Does not stun

label: Razor
descriptionHtml:
• Unstable Currentno longer slows or purges a random enemy unit every 5 seconds
  • Unstable Current now deals 60/80/100/120 damage to every enemy unit within 500 AoE every 6/5/4/3 seconds

label: Riki
descriptionHtml:
• Blink Strikecooldown rescaled from 16/12/8/4 to 10/8/6/4
  • Blink Strike damage rescaled from 100 to 75/90/105/120

label: Rubick
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 3
  • Agility increased from 14 + 1.6 to 19 + 2.1
  • Intelligence gain increased from 2.4 to 2.7

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml:
• Sand Stormis no longer a channeled ability
    • The Sand Storm and the invisibility end immediately once you leave the area
    • Attacking or casting temporarily reveals you for 0.7 seconds
  • Sand Storm AoE changed from 525 to 350/450/550/650
  • Sand Storm damage rescaled from 40/60/80/100 to 25/50/75/100
  • Sand Storm cooldown rescaled from 34/26/18/10 to 34/28/22/16
  • Sand Storm duration reduced from 50 to 20/25/30/35
  • Sand Storm visual effects updated slightly

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedSoul Catcher
    • Targets a 175/200/225/250 AoE area
    • Causes all enemy units in the area to lose 25/30/35/40% of their current health, and gain half of it back after 10 seconds
    • Cooldown: 26/24/22/20
    • Cast Range: 700
    • Mana Cost: 110
    • Dispelling this gains your health back as well

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml: • Base armor increased by 1

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Mass Serpent Wardsnow spawn in a circle, with a slightly bigger empty spot in the middle
  • Mass Serpent Wards now has an AoE spawn indicator

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Concussive Shotnow hits a creep if there are no nearby enemy heroes
    • Deals 75% damage to creeps

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml: • Base armor increased by 1

label: Slark
descriptionHtml: • Turn rate improved from 0.6 to 0.7

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml:
• Take Aimcan now be activated to double your attack range for your next attack
    • Goes on cooldown after the attack is used
    • Cooldown: 15/12/9/6
    • Mana Cost: 30

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml: • Nether Strikecan no longer be cast when rooted

label: Sven
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedWarcry
    • Now grants you and nearby allied heroes bonus movement speed and an HP shield that blocks attack damage based on the shield's health
    • Damage block is calculated after armor reduction
    • Lasts 10 seconds
    • Buff ends if the shield is consumed
    • Movement Speed: 8/12/16/20%
    • Attack Shield Health: 100/200/300/400 Health
    • AoE: 700
    • Cooldown: 36/32/28/24
    • Mana Cost: 40

label: Techies
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed increased from 270 to 315
  • Base intelligence increased by 2

label: Templar Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Level 20 Talent changed from Refraction Dispels to Meld Dispels
  • Level 25 Talent changed from Psi Blades Spill Paralyzes to 1.5s Meld Hit Bash

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Sundercan no longer pierce Spell Immunity
  • Level 20 Talent reduced from -10s Reflection Cooldown to -8

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml: • Anchor Smashnow attacks every unit in the area with a bonus 45/90/135/180 damage on top of your attack

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml: • Chakramprojectile damage no longer ignores Ancients

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml:
• Tree Grabarea damage no longer works when denying units
  • Tree Grab cooldown increased from 24/20/16/12 to 27/22/17/12

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedNature's Guise
    • Passive
    • Has a 4.75/4/3.25/2.5 second fade delay, taking damage resets the counter
    • Grants you invisibility, treewalking ability, and 10/15/20/25% movement speed bonus as long as you are within 265 distance of a tree
    • Has a 0.75 linger duration
    • Attacking a unit out of this roots the target for 0.4/1/1.6/2.2 seconds and deals a total of 30/80/130/180 damage during the root

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml: • Base damage increased from 38-56 to 44-56

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• Replaced Frozen Sigil withTag Team
    • Activatable Aura
    • Lasts 5 seconds
    • Causes affected enemies to take 25/50/75/100 more physical damage from attacks and be slowed by 75% for 0.5 seconds
    • AoE: 350
    • Cooldown: 15
    • Mana Cost: 40/50/60/70
    • Tusk can crit off this physical damage

label: Underlord
descriptionHtml: • Atrophy Auranow provides a permanent +2/3/4/5 bonus damage when a hero dies under the aura

label: Undying
descriptionHtml: • Base movement speed reduced from 305 to 295

label: Ursa
descriptionHtml: • FixedOverpowernot consuming attack count when an attack is evaded

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Vengeance Aurano longer creates illusions of dying allies
  • Vengeance Aura now creates the Scepter effect on dying as a base mechanic, without the ability to cast spells
    • Gaining Scepter unlocks casting spells

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml: • Plague Wardscollision size increased

label: Viper
descriptionHtml:
• NethertoxinAoE increased from 300 to 350
  • Nethertoxin damage rescaled from 20/30/40/50 to 20/35/50/65

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:
• Fatal Bondsnow bounces from unit to unit, rather than just searching units near the target
  • Fatal Bonds no longer ignores units in Fog of War

label: Weaver
descriptionHtml:
• The Swarmunits now have higher attack priority
    • Follows the same rules asPhantom's Embrace

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml: • Death Warddamage increased from 60/105/150 to 75/125/175

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• Skeletons health reduced from 350 to 250
  • Skeletons now reincarnate 3 seconds after dying the first time

label: Zeus
descriptionHtml:
• Nimbusis no longer automatically selected when hitting Tab
  • Nimbus Lightning Bolt no longer benefits from cooldown reductions on your hero
